const[partner,setPartner]=useState('');const[partnerSuggestions,setPartnerSuggestions]=useState([]);const getPartnerSuggestions=value=>{const inputValue=(value||'').trim().toLowerCase();if(inputValue.length<2)return[];return partners.filter(p=>typeof p==='string'&&p.toLowerCase().includes(inputValue));};const handlePartnerChange=(event,_ref)=>{let{newValue}=_ref;setPartner(newValue);};const partnerInputProps={placeholder:'Введите название партнёра (например, ВТБ)',value:partner,onChange:handlePartnerChange,onFocus:handleFocus,onBlur:handleBlur,autoComplete:'off'};// --------------------- Шаг 2: спикеры ---------------------
